events.title: Blxst - I'll Always Come Find You Tour
events.location: Chicago, Illinois, United States Of America
events.description: Doors open at 6PM. Performance begins at 7PM. This show is for ALL AGES. House of Blues Chicago is a standing room only venue, all tickets are General Admission unless otherwise stated. *All support acts are subject to change without notice.* TICKET DELIVERY DELAY UNTIL OCT. 27, 2024. In collaboration with Education is Key 501(c)(3), $1 per each ticket sold on the I'll Always Come Find You Tour will be donated to provide scholarships for inner city students in Blxst's hometown of Los Angeles. Beyond scholarships, Education is Key hosts annual community events throughout LA and offers mentorship programs for high school students, with the goal of empowering and developing self-sustainability amongst LA's youth as they transition into young adults. To learn more, visit https://www.eduiskey.org.

events.title: Blxst - I'll Always Come Find You Tour
events.location: New Orleans, Louisiana, United States Of America
events.description: Fillmore New Orleans is a cashless venue. Only cards are accepted. BOX OFFICE: 4:00pm LOBBY DOORS: 6:00pm DOORS: 7:00pm SHOW: 8:00pm All Ages Welcome The Box Office is open on event days only. The Box Office will open two hours prior to doors on these days and remain open until show headliner hits the stage. During posted hours, the Box Office can be reached at 504.881.1555 ext 6. For questions outside of posted hours, please email FillmoreNOLABoxOffice@livenation.com. Tickets are available 24/7 online at livenation.com NOTE OUR BAG POLICY: Approved bags: Bags with a maximum size: 12"x6"x12" Prohibited bags: Backpacks and other multi-compartment bags or laptop cases regardless of size For VIP upgrades, please email: fillmorevipseats@livenation.com
